attributes.action: Rid us  of the public appointments commission and other quangos.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PAC has to go. In it's place we may need  a  PAST - Public Apointments System for Toads. At least this more accurately reflects the function served.

Abolishing quangos will force, otherwise,  sensible men and women to seek more healthy and 
productive pursuits, paid or not.

PAST would recruit only the most obseqious types. Their roles would be symbolic. They would be encouraged to attend focus groups and thought shower with like minded others.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
